article_text:
My wife, who hates you all, suggested this as today’s music selection:

Well, there it is. But as for actual music — well, I suspect a lot of readers will hate this too. But you have to explore!

I first became aware of the vocal group Mountain Man when they were backup singers for Feist. One member of the group, Amelia Meath, has a side venture that is strange but has that spark, that edge, that sense that this is the real thing that I’m always looking for:

Watch it — this is something special, even if it isn’t your normal cup of tea.
article_summary:
My wife, who hates you all, suggested this as today’s music selection:Well, there it is.
I first became aware of the vocal group Mountain Man when they were backup singers for Feist.
But as for actual music — well, I suspect a lot of readers will hate this too.
But you have to explore!
One member of the group, Amelia Meath, has a side venture that is strange but has that spark, that edge, that sense that this is the real thing that I’m always looking for:Watch it — this is something special, even if it isn’t your normal cup of tea.
